# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    words = split(strip(str), " ")
    lines = String[]
    
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word * " "
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end
    
    !isempty(line) && push!(lines, line)
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```
Example: `wrap_string("Hello! This is a test.", text_width = 10)`
Output:
```
"Hello!\nThis is a\ntest."
```
